recipe.title: Yummy Tacos for Two
ingredients: 1 package (9 ounces) Perdue Short Cuts Carved Chicken Breast Strips, Grilled
instructions: In a medium skillet, sauté bell pepper in oil until soft, about 6 minutes. Add chicken, garlic, salsa, salt and pepper; cook, stirring, until heated through. Stuff taco shells with chicken mixture, cheese and jalapeño, if desired.
